name: GameJam2022
description:
This is a "Point and Click Adventure" game which I made for GGJ 2022. My first game in this genre. I developed every piece of this game. Every line of code, every drawing belong to me. My first isometric pixel art drawing is this. 

Main idea of the game is trying to keep yourself healthy, clean, energetic, happy and filled to be able continue working on your tasks. Let's show your skills!
